mapper.sql: user_id, login_no, username, password, state, is_system, salt, login_count, last_time, last_ip, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time,phone,email,head_image
mapper.select: select t.user_id,t.login_no,t.username,t.state, is_system,phone,email,head_image from sys_user t where user_id = #{userId,typeHandler=LongTypeHandler}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (login_no, username, password, state, is_system, salt, login_count, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time,phone,email,head_image) values (#{loginNo}, #{username}, #{password}, #{state},0, #{salt},0, #{createdBy,typeHandler=LongTypeHandler}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedBy,typeHandler=LongTypeHandler}, #{modifiedTime},#{phone},#{email},#{headImage})
mapper.update: update sys_user set username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,typeHandler=LongTypeHandler}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime} where user_id = #{userId,typeHandler=LongTypeHandler}
